thread.title: After Being Released From the Hospital, George HW Bush Gets Some INCREDIBLE News…
thread.title_full: After Being Released From the Hospital, George HW Bush Gets Some INCREDIBLE News…

author: Nickarama
title: After Being Released From the Hospital, George HW Bush Gets Some INCREDIBLE News…
text:
07:35pm February 1, 2017   
People were quite concerned when former President George H.W. Bush went to the hospital, suffering from pneumonia on January 14. 
His wife Barbara was also taken to the hospital as a precaution. She was suffering from bronchitis. 
She was given the go ahead to be released, but stayed longer to be with her husband of 72 years. 
Theirs has been the longest Presidential marriage in history. 
George H.W. Bush was soon making great strides in recovery and it wasn’t just the love of his wife helping him. 
He had a goal helping him: the desire to go to the Super Bowl in his hometown in Houston on February 5. 
The NFL heard that about his goal, so they planned something special for him. 
According to the Washington Examiner, the NFL invited Bush to perform the opening coin toss at the Super Bowl on Sunday, NFL commissioner Roger Goodell confirmed Wednesday. 
Bush’s spokesman said Bush was very honored by the invite. Pres/Mrs @GeorgeHWBush are honored by @NFL Commissioner Goddell's kind invite to flip the coin b4 #SuperBowl , and are looking forward to it. 
— Jim McGrath (@jgm41) February 1, 2017 
Bush himself even weighed in today. Getting fired up for Sunday and #SuperBowl . pic.twitter.com/zlXmsZJrTM 
— George Bush (@GeorgeHWBush) February 1, 2017 
Very nice gesture from the NFL. 
Certainly enough to help anyone’s recovery! LIKE this article?
